hero.title: Paw Adoptions
description: Paw Adoptions is a charity wanting to help the millions of animals in shelters find a loving home. Their aim is to have an online platform to assist shelters by advertising their animals to an audience of pet lovers looking to adopt, eager to help make a change and save lives.

projectDetails.title: Market Research
projectDetails.description: Finding a suitable organisation to adopt a pet from can be challenging. I want to remove this step from the process and link people straight to the animals.

projectDetails.title: Wireframes
projectDetails.description: I mapped out a quick and simple way of connecting people with the right animals by implementing search barriers, starting with a quick survey once signing up. .

projectDetails.title: App Design
projectDetails.description: With the pets in the spotlight, I designed the app to be welcoming and soft by using warm colours combined with a light and concise layout.

text: Most adoption processes are found to be challenging and intense. However, I have created a calm and friendly app for adoptions to be enjoyable, all in the palm of your hand.
Paw Adoptions can now help reduce the amount of unwanted animals with an online platform that is quick and accessible to pet lovers.
